name: Telogis
tag_list: saas, cloud-based, location-intelligence, fleet, routing, commercial-navigation, gps, fleet-management, enterprise-solution, enterprise-software, oil-and-gas, trucking, beverage-delivery, navigation, mobile-integration, telematics, work-order-management
overview:
Telogis provides a comprehensive cloud-based location intelligence platform for companies that require dynamic routing, real-time work order management, navigation, telematics and mobile integration services for their mobile workforces.

Telogis’ consistent innovation drives its ability to provide near-instant return on investment while improving driver safety and efficiency and reducing the environmental impact of commercial vehicles.

Founded in 2001, Telogis is headquartered in Aliso Viejo, Calif. and has development and support centers in Australia and New Zealand, Latin America, Europe and throughout North America. Its products and services are used and distributed in more than 100 countries worldwide.

milestones.description: Telogis Acquires Mobile Resource and Fleet Management Solutions Business of Intergis
milestones.source_description: Telogis Acquires Mobile Resource and Fleet Management Solutions Business of Intergis

milestones.source_text: Ford Motor Co. and Telogis, Inc. today announced that Ford is joining with Telogis, a location intelligence business, to provide fleet customers with a telematics solution for fleet operations. The next-generation Crew Chief powered by Telogis is available at all Ford dealers in North America. Ford aims to bring its fleet customers a premium location-based platform that makes their fleets safer, greener and more efficient.

milestones.description: Fueled by market demand and strong year-over-year growth again in 2011, Telogis, Inc. was listed among Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500™ for the fifth year in a row, and topped the list in the location intelligence industry. Technology Fast 500 award winner
milestones.source_description: Telogis’ 704 Percent Growth Fuels Ranking on Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500 for Fifth Consecutive Year

milestones.description: With a 418 percent growth rate between 2008 and 2011, Telogis, Inc., was once again named by Inc. Magazine to its Inc. 5000 list of the fastest-growing private companies in North America for its sixth consecutive year.
milestones.source_description: Telogis Earns Inc. Magazine’s “Inc. 5000″ Distinction as One of the Fastest-Growing Private Companies in North America 6 Years Running
